评论详情: High quality material, thick, long pants, great value for money (I did purchase on sale).  I bought this set on sale as my “coming home” outfit after I had my baby girl. I wore this set & sweater a ton while in my last couple months of pregnancy- pants are comfy, stretchy, and versatile even on my big belly. They were long enough to hike up my belly so they wouldn’t fall off (I’m 5’7” & ordered a small). I wore the sweater with maternity jeans a lot & feel like even though it has been washed 3xs as much as the pants, the color still matches really well. Both pieces are thick & kept me warm. I plan on wearing this all winter now that I’m not pregnant too!

I was impressed with the product weight and quality, but, unfortunately I will return.  At 5'3", 115, I was swimming in a size S.  I looked like a child wearing her mother's clothing.  Too bad because it was a cute outfit.

评论概述: I love this set!  True to size!
评论详情: I just got this and couldn’t wait to try it on and I was not disappointed.  Everything fit great and offered the right amount of slouch that I was looking for.  I normally wear a size 12 and I got the XL and the fit was perfect.  They are a little long but I’m a little short, only 5’3”.  I pulled them up a little higher and they are perfect!  The fabric is nice and they are a thick material that’s great for wearing now in the cooler weather.
Fit perfect! Great for my long travel days on airplane. Cuter than just a sweatsuit

评论概述: Top isn't as oversized as advertized
评论详情: Before washing the pants fit perfectly, not sure how they will be after washing.  The top was NOT as oversized as I thought it would.  Fits like a comfortable sweatshit.  The dropped shoulder seams actually pull a bit when laying down and wanting to move your arms when in bed.The biggest negative, is that the red knit of the trim on the top DOES NOT match the red of the pants.  Much oranger.  For a set, I expected that they would match perfectly.  Looks like I bought the top and pants separatelyand from different manufacturers
I ordered this for Xmas for my granddaughter. The striped top was very cute and the fabric was nice and soft
Not as soft as I had hoped.  Maybe once it’s washed.
the actual pattern is not the most flattering, but the actual material is good, not the best. i can say the pants are the best quality. over all good set for the price.
Hi, material heavy,pants are to long,you are going to be sewing.! The left pocket,they didn't get the sewing right,hand can't get in.!The top,made me look so big,it's stripes.!👖👕
My wife likes the feel of the fabric and the fit is good as well.
This is a really cute outfit and the fit is so great. However, the colors don't match. The trim on the shirt is navy and the pants are black. It's not just a little off but very noticable.

I am 5’5 158. I sized down to a Medium because I didn’t want it very baggy. I love the fit. It is very comfortable and the length is perfect with shoes. I got many compliments on it. This is my second set. I highly recommend.
I bought the 2x I'm 5'9 220..... Fits great long enuff on the legs. Just bought another set in a different color. Very. Comfortable with some weight to it. Perfect for fall/winter.
True to size exactly as described color true to pix
The product material was terrible
The shirt was perfect. The pants were a little snug. I would size up if in between sizes for comfort

评论概述: Cozy, Stylish, and Perfect for Lounging or Running Errands
评论详情: The oversized sweatshirt paired with the wide-leg sweatpants gives it that trendy, relaxed vibe, and the striped color block design makes it stand out from your typical lounge set. It’s perfect for chilling at home, but honestly, I’ve been wearing it out for quick errands too because it’s just that comfortable.  If you’re looking for a tracksuit that’s equal parts cozy and stylish, this set totally delivers. Plus, it’s perfect for those days when you just want to feel put together without putting in too much effort (we’ve all been there, LOL).  Also, if you aren't aware, this kind of look is all the rage now :)
4️⃣out of5️⃣

I think this is just such a cute little set! So imagine my happiness upon finding that it’s ALSO true to size! I was actually giddy. It came just in time for the cold weather. And though the bottoms are white (despite that dumb white/Labor Day rule, white is just a risky color to wear through the wet and muddy months of winter), the top being multicolored makes me feel it’s okay to wear in the cold months. Inside the house where it’s safer, at least (and where no one can fashion-police me). 🤪 And the outfit is super cozy and warm. Super soft inside the top. They did a great job on this outfit, all around.

This Kikibell women's two piece outfit is indeed oversized. It will be very nice for the cooler weather that is coming.  It is made of a heavier weight sweatsuit material, is machine washable and dryable. Love the pockets.

评论概述: VERY oversized and slouchy, comfortable lounge set
评论详情: I am 5’8” and ordered XL in pink and green.  The top is very oversized, but the XL pants fit me true to size.  If you don’t want such an oversized fit, might want to size down one size.  The fabric is a medium weight knit with French terry interior.  The pants have a drawstring, stitched down front seams and pockets.  Comfortable lounge set.  Seems a bit pricey compared to similar items.

I ordered this lounge set for my wife, who is 5'6" and wears an XL. While the pants are indeed wide-legged as expected, they are unfortunately too long for her. The length measurements provided are accurate, so I should have paid closer attention before ordering.  She likes the overall look of the set, but the fit isn't ideal for her height. The fabric has a medium weight, and although it's not the softest, it is still comfortable enough for lounging.  A better fit would have made this set more practical and enjoyable for her to wear.

评论概述: Kind of like a Candy Land outfit
评论详情: So, if I were just lounging around the house, this set would be fine.  If I were to leave the house, you might think I was a character from Candy Land (the pink and green set).  Just too cutesy.  Material is okay. The sleeves on the top were too long and too wide.  The pants fit well though.  There is a stitch/seam down the front of the legs that made me think it was a wrinkle of some sort.  In the end, I ended up returning the set.
Got this for my daughter. She's 14. She loves wearing this outfit together or separately. Says it helps her in the skibidi fit check, whatever that means.
Great for lounging around the house.  Love the bright colors.  Fits great!  Great quality

评论概述: Fot the price, this is the BEST PURCHASE ON AMAZON!
评论详情: Literally so cute! The pants alone are worth the $20!!..The sweatshirt top doesnt have the best construction but honestly it's a cute "throw it on and go" type of outfit! The pants have a pintuck down them and look a like you spent $$ on them! I'm ordering another set because of the pants!
Beautiful color! Perfect lounge set for summer to fall transition. If you accessorized it properly could work out for good out. I used for morning walks or running errands.

I like this color block sweatsuit in purple. The color purple is as shown in image. This sweatsuit is made very well. The quality is good. It is also very comfortable.  I am also very pleased that, I can run out to the grocery store and look presentable.  It's going to be perfect for fall. Not too hot and not too cold. I am very pleased with my choice.
So soft and comfy!  Fits true to size

I absolutely love everything about this women’s lounge outfit! The quality exceeded expectations and the price tag is super affordable. I love how comfortable this outfit is. The fabric is soft and breathable with a perfect amount of stretch. It fits true to size with a relaxed silhouette it’s flattering on a variety of body types. I love the sleek streamline appearance of this outfit because it really does a great job of elongating your body. Highly recommend!

I received this tracksuit and I absolutely love it!! I was skeptical on sizing seeing as I can do a medium or a large. I opted for a large to be on the safe side and It was a perfect fit! The material feels good on my skin and appears to be well made and not cheap looking at all. The length of the pants are perfect for me as I have long legs so if you have shorter legs, the pants may be too long. There was no loose threads and the color was beautiful. The sizing appears to run true to size. The pockets on the pants are pretty deep and I like the pleads in the front. This is the perfect outfit to either dress up or dress down and will work well for traveling. I highly recommend.

评论概述: True to size and good quality
评论详情: This lounge outfit is perfect for what I need at home when friends stay over or I am on a girls weeekend. It is flattering but comfortable. It washes well.  The material did not shrink in the dryer.  The color stayed rich even after multiple washes and itndid not leak into other clothes while washing which is a huge plus for such a dark color.  The fabric felt breathable but is thick enough that I don't worry every roll and bump will show through it on a lazy Sunday morning.  The outfit was a huge success!

Really nice two-piece outfit. Comfortable material and fit. Grateful those cool days and you just want to be comfortable. Great price on the outfit. Love the variety of colors. Great gift idea and great price.
